mint-day_one-default.text: Do not mind the others – I'm sure you came here as fast as you could, Dr Pink
mint-day_one-default.speaker: mint

mint-day_one-default.text: In any event, you're here now. That's all that matters
mint-day_one-default.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-yes.text: All those lives lost, and for nothing... god, this is a nightmare
meeting_day_two-yes.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-yes.text: I should have fought it harder. I should have convinced you not to do it
meeting_day_two-yes.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-no.text: Oh – it's you. It's good to see you again, Pink
meeting_day_two-no.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-no.text: Thank you for choosing to see reason yesterday. I knew you were a good man
meeting_day_two-no.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-no.text: We still have time... it's going to be alright
meeting_day_two-no.speaker: mint
